TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19636=That's the stuff we want to have in 4.2, very roughly ordered by priority. Releases are scheduled for early January 2009., 13451=Urgent tasks that need to be finished for the KDE 4.1 release (May 19th):}
textBeforeTable: Overview on the current state of support for various types: Supported Types [mailto: <>] Not using the scheduler to avoid the serialization of operations, see RSS resource. (This will get very complicated. Maybe use a proxy ResourceBase for this, which is thread-pooled?) Alternative for Akonadi::ResourceBase TO DO [mailto: <>] Item change notification do not yet include their source collections (real and virtual) Extended notifications IN PROGRESS [mailto: <>] Data and settings from pre-Akonadi times, see below Migration IN PROGRESS <Tobias> The libakonadi move as well as the huge API changes following it broke lots of the docs technical and content-wise, see below Fix API docs IN PROGRESS Volker <vkrause@kde.org> see below Action framework IN PROGRESS
